mapper.insert: insert into message_label (MESSAGE_LABEL_ID, MESSAGE_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK) values (#{messageLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{messageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update message_label set MESSAGE_ID = #{messageId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, INJECTION_LABEL_ID = #{injectionLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where MESSAGE_LABEL_ID = #{messageLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MESSAGE_LABEL_ID, MESSAGE_ID, INJECTION_LABEL_ID, STATUS_CD, CREATE_STAFF, UPDATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, STATUS_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK from message_label where MESSAGE_LABEL_ID = #{messageLabelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
